thread.title: Notice Anything UNUSUAL About ‘Trophy Girls’ at the Grammys Tonight? Take a Good Close Look…
thread.title_full: Notice Anything UNUSUAL About ‘Trophy Girls’ at the Grammys Tonight? Take a Good Close Look…

author: Nickarama
title: Notice Anything UNUSUAL About ‘Trophy Girls’ at the Grammys Tonight? Take a Good Close Look…
text:
The 59th Annual Grammy Awards is featuring a first tonight. 
It will be the first time male and transgender “trophy girls” will be handing out the Grammys to the artists. 
From Breitbart: 
“To be honest, the idea of a ‘trophy girl’ has felt antiquated for some time now,” Neil Portnow, president of the Recording Academy, said in a statement Friday. “Who wrote that rule anyway? The ability to present a trophy has nothing to do with one’s gender.” 
Viewers watching Sunday’s Grammys will see three trophy handlers, including transgender model Martina Robledo, actor Derek Marrocco, and model and actress Hollin Haley. 
He’s right. 
Gender isn’t important in handing out a trophy. 
So why is it necessary that you spell out that there will be a man and a transgender model, if it isn’t important? 
Let me answer that for you. 
Because it fits the current political agenda that you want to be highlighting. 
Otherwise you wouldn’t mention it at all. 
The only thing that’s important in passing out a trophy is that you don’t trip and drop it on the floor. 
It isn’t about politics. LIKE this article?
